author: cmpilato
msg: Fix the Community Guide's internal links so that when in single-page
viewing mode internal links point to single-page destinations, and
when viewing the Guide in parts the internal links point to the
Use SSI #set to set a bunch of page name definition variables here
for the names of the pieces of this Community Guide.
Replace explicit or implicit references to individual pages in this
Community Guide with SSI #echo statements for page name variables.
Set the page name definition variables to the empty string.  This
allows all "intra-page" bookmarks to still point to the single-page
